title: v2.1.1 is ready
content:
Features:
  - Outline tool

Enhancements:
  - Disabled touches around the slider area to avoid stray touches
  - Shortened the timeout for launch request

Fixes:
  - Critical fix: file conversion from version 2.0.x to 2.1.x. A self-fix option is available in settings.
  - Timelapse background being black
  - Shading sometimes does not register color selection
